name: places/ChIJyX5w_ahZwokRZJpk5hBayCY
formattedAddress: 18 W 33rd St, New York, NY 10001, USA
adrFormatAddress: 18 W 33rd St, New York, NY 10001, USA

originalText.text:
Regal picked up my family at JFK when we were returning late on a Friday evening from a trip to Florida.  The service was excellent - the car was clean and comfortable and the driver was polite and attentive.  Our flight was delayed over 2 hours, due to bad weather, and we didn't arrive until well past midnight, so we were particularly appreciative that the driver was waiting nearby, ready to pick us up as soon as we were ready with our baggage.

Great service, I will definitely use them again.

originalText.text: I couldn't not write a great review after receiving such great service. Not joking, went through 2-3 vendors this last week and Regal was not only very professional, they answer right away and you're not waiting for an operator. The staff is very lovely, and huge shoutout to George who helped us with a number of our transport needs. Regal Carriage, we'll definitely be back in touch and I'll be singing your praises. Thanks for making transpo through NY much smoother.

originalText.text: I used Regal for my wedding in the summer of 2013.  Not only were their prices the most reasonable and consistent of everyone I researched, but they even upgraded all my vehicles from town cars to Mercedes and Cadillacs for free because they weren't booked elsewhere for the same price!  Their drivers were very professional and courteous, the vehicles were immaculate and because I pre-paid there was absolutely zero hassle when I got to my final destination...they simply dropped us off, said congratulations and were on their way!  I am not easily impressed, especially when I'm spending a lot of money on something, I expect to get what I paid for, but I was thoroughly pleased with this car service.  Awesome service.

originalText.text: Used these guys few times for airport pick ups and in town, so far had a very pleasant experience. On time pick ups, nice clean cars, and responsive customer service team. Were able to get receipts for my work reimburesement through the website. Nice iPhone app and functional site. What more can you ask from. Highly recommend!!

originalText.text:
Today is 12//11/21
I would give this company ZERO stars if I could.
If you use this service and get in a accident you will have a problem. In the process of filing a complaint against the owner George Anderson and the company I found out that the company is no longer licensed with TLC and has not been licensed for several months but still operating from his apartment. SO weather you drive for the company or ride as a passenger and get in a accident you will have a major problem. Lic: B02054
